options.name: Solid Earth Starfield
options.explain:
Overall Damage +6%
Atk. Increase +245%

[Blessing of the Four Seasons]
Receive a blessing from the four seasons to reinforce yourself. 50% of the Blessing effect also applied to all party members.
- Can't stack with the same Blessing.

* Blessing of Warm Spring
 - Overall Damage +1%
* Blessing of Vibrant Summer
  - HP/MP +10% for 10 sec. every 10 sec.
* Blessing of Bountiful Autumn
  - Physical/Magical damage reduction +10%

options.explain:
[Raging Lightning Cloud]
Attacks summon a Raging Lightning Cloud that attacks up to 4 enemies and applies effects, depending on the number of equipped Thunder equipment (2/3/5).
- Raging Lightning Cloud Summon Cooldown: 7.5 sec./5 sec./3 sec.
- Inflicts 1,500%of total Atk. Increase, Neutralize Gauge -5

[Open Dimension]

- All speed +30% for 10 sec. after the dimension duration

All Elemental Damage +10

[Soul Weapon]
Basic/Jump/Dash attacks summon a Soul Weapon that deliver sword attacks.
- Sword attack count +5 when casting skills
- When sword attack count is 50, use up all count to deliver a powerful sword attack.
- The sword attack and powerful sword attack inflict 60 and 2,400% of total Atk. Increase, respectively.
